db:abstract.db:para: Encapsulate a Spot Light object in a Qt 3D scene.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: constantAttenuation : float
db:section.db:para: Specifies the constant attenuation of the spot light

db:section.db:title: cutOffAngle : float
db:section.db:para: Specifies the cut off angle of the spot light

db:section.db:title: linearAttenuation : float
db:section.db:para: Specifies the linear attenuation of the spot light

db:section.db:title: localDirection : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Specifies the local direction of the spot light

db:section.db:title: quadraticAttenuation : float
db:section.db:para: Specifies the quadratic attenuation of the spot light
